title: Cognitive Modeling Workshop for Understanding Botanical Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers. Emphasizes acquisition of practical botany knowledge and spatial understanding of complex concepts

learning_goals: Learners can explain plant structures and classification systems with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can model plant growth processes in simulation environments by dividing them into three or more stages.
Learners can represent interactions between plant organs as concept maps using VR-based learning tools.
Learners can revise their cognitive models at least twice through peer feedback and prompt-based activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
